comments:

Symptom is a NPE being thrown:

() for servlet wsdl.forms.InvokeWSDLOperationForm_jsp threw exception

Here's an example:

<definitions ...>
  <types>
    <xs:schema>
      <xs:import namespace="http://example.com" schemaLocation="example.xsd"/>
    </xs:schema>
  </types>
  ...
</definitions>

I'll submit a patch.

Created an attachment (id=20785)
Apply this to the explorer plugin
